content: वैद्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (द्यी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Relating to the Vedas, spiritual. {@--2@} Relating to medicine, medical. --द्यः [विद्या अस्त्यस्य अण्] {@--1@} A learned man, scholar, doctor. {@--2@} A medical man, physician. वैद्ययत्नपरिभाविनं गदं न प्रदाप इव वायुमत्यगात् <ls>R. 19. 53</ls>; वैद्यानामातुरः श्रेयान् <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls> {@--3@} A man of the medical caste, supposed to be one of the mixed classes; (the offspring of a Brāhmaṇa by a Vaiśya woman). {@--4@} A man of a lower mixed tribe (the offspring of a Śūdra father by Vaiśya mother).
